MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK8 and FK9 postcode areas of Falkirk. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Our engineers are on site with additional resources investigating a suspected underground fault and we now expect your supply to be restored by 12:00am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:26pm on 21st January 2021.
